dict.string: You will be redirected to BCA KlikPay page once you tap ‘Confirm Payment’ button
For payment, you can choose to use KlikBCA Individu Account or BCA Credit Card
For more information about BCA KlikPay please contact Halo BCA at (021) 1500888 or visit <link>http://klikbca.com/KlikPay/klikpay.html</link>
